entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
